title: CSE 5472 - Information Security Projects
description: Team-based projects: solve information security problems (mobile/static host/network hardening, intrusion detection and vulnerability scanning, forensics); results communicated through report writing and presentation. Prereq: 3901 (560) or 3902 or 3903, and 3461 or 5461 or 5471. Not open to students with credit for 652.
